links.title: Nvidia might be losing Tesla, but it's still firmly in the driver's seat
links.description: A string of late-September reports and announcements have driven home a few truisms about where Nvidia Corp. ( NVDA) stands, as much of the tech world, as well as parts of the broader corporate world, starts to make AI-related investments a key R&D priority: Nvidia is facing growing direct and indirect competition from other chipmakers developing AI-related solutions, and by no means has a monopoly on developing quality silicon.
